code: import React from'react';import'./profile.css';import{zoomIn}from'react-animations';import{StyleSheet,css}from'aphrodite';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Profile=function Profile(){var styles=StyleSheet.create({stats:{animationName:zoomIn,animationDuration:'0.75s',padding:'1em',margin:'1em',color:'black',backgroundColor:'green'},summary:{animationName:zoomIn,animationDuration:'0.75s'},goal:{animationName:zoomIn,animationDuration:'0.75s'},mindset:{animationName:zoomIn,animationDuration:'0.75s',display:'flex',flexFlow:'column wrap',width:'75%',alignItems:'center'}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mainContainerItem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:css(styles.stats),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Name:   Boswell Orendain"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Role:   FrontEnd Developer"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"summary-goal mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:css(styles.summary),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"BACKGROUND"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Graduated from Humber (Institute of Applied Technology and Advanced Learning) witih an Associate's Degree in Computer Engineering.
